component.name: Calendar
component.description: Date picker grid for selecting single dates or date ranges.

useCases: Selecting a single date in a form
Choosing a date range for filtering or scheduling
Inline calendar display for date-centric interfaces
Popover-based date picker when paired with Popover

commonPatterns.name: date-range-picker
commonPatterns.description: Calendar for selecting a start and end date range

commonPatterns.name: popover-date-picker
commonPatterns.description: Calendar inside a Popover triggered by a button for compact form fields
commonPatterns.composition:
<Popover>
  <PopoverTrigger asChild>
    <Button variant="outline">{format(date, 'PPP')}</Button>
  </PopoverTrigger>
  <PopoverContent className="w-auto p-0">
    <Calendar mode="single" selected={date} onSelect={setDate} />
  </PopoverContent>
</Popover>

commonPatterns.name: disabled-dates
commonPatterns.composition: <Calendar mode="single" selected={date} onSelect={setDate} disabled={(date) => date < new Date()} />

antiPatterns.reason: Calendar only supports date selection, not time
antiPatterns.alternative: Pair Calendar with a separate time picker input

antiPatterns.scenario: Embedding Calendar inline when space is limited
antiPatterns.reason: Calendar takes significant vertical space; it can crowd compact forms
antiPatterns.alternative: Wrap Calendar in a Popover for compact layouts

antiPatterns.reason: Uncontrolled calendars make it difficult to integrate with form state
antiPatterns.alternative: Always use selected and onSelect for controlled behavior

slots.children: No child slots; Calendar is self-contained with internal day grid

parentConstraints: Often placed inside PopoverContent for popover-based date pickers

interactions.click: Selects a day; in range mode, first click sets start, second click sets end
interactions.hover: Day cell gains muted background on hover
interactions.navigate: Previous/next month buttons with chevron icons; multi-month display via numberOfMonths prop

responsive.mobile: Months stack vertically in multi-month mode (flex-col)
responsive.desktop: Months display side-by-side in multi-month mode (flex-row)

accessibility.role: Uses react-day-picker with proper grid, gridcell, and button roles
accessibility.keyboardSupport: Arrow keys to navigate days; Enter/Space to select; Tab to move between navigation buttons
accessibility.screenReader: Announces month/year caption, selected state, today indicator, and disabled dates
accessibility.focusManagement: Visible 2px focus ring on day buttons and navigation buttons

rules: showOutsideDays is true by default to prevent layout shifts
Selected dates use primary background with primary-foreground text
Range middle days use 15% opacity primary fill with no border radius
Range start days have right border radius removed; range end days have left border radius removed
Today is indicated by font-weight semibold
Navigation buttons have border, background, and hover styles matching the design system
Custom classNames can be merged via the classNames prop

aiHints.context: Use for any date selection need. For compact forms, wrap in a Popover with a Button trigger. For date range selection, use mode='range' with numberOfMonths={2}. Built on react-day-picker; accepts all DayPicker props.
